name: JET ADVENTURE
description:
JET ADVENTURE GAME: 

Climb into space by crossing the plains and snow-capped mountains of Earth. Defeat the creatures and monsters you encounter along your way. Empower yourself to overcome obstacles and beat any enemy. Always reach a higher peak proving to be the best. You will find help and weapons along your way that will help you on your very long climb.

PS. Remember to rest sometimes because when you arrive at a checkpoint you can click on the menu and rest for a while ... but don't quit the game or you'll lose everything!

 

THE CHARACTER: 

Jack, a simple student from New Mexico, very sunny but not very sociable. One day he engages in the scientific competition of his school by creating a jet pack that will make him win the competition but will force him to run away and come across animals and enemies never seen before.

 

UNLOCKABLES:

DOUBLE HIT: fire two shots instead of one making the climb faster and safer.

PERFORATING STRIKES: Can't you hit an enemy because he's behind another enemy? Buy piercing hits and turn your enemies to ash.

-->Rebounding blows: Jack designed bouncing bullets, you could use them to help you.

-->KNOCKBACK: Hit the enemies with a blow so hard that they are thrown back. 

SUPPLIES:

-->BOMBS: Destroy enemies with one blow with one big explosion

 

-->LIFE: recover a life when you need it

WEAPONS:

                         GUN:                        

 PUMP SPEARGUN:

BASEBALL BALL:

IRON BAR:
